thread.title: Plan ahead to attend these festivals across the Northwest and B.C.
thread.title_full: Plan ahead to attend these festivals across the Northwest and B.C.

author: Seattle Times staff
title: Plan ahead to attend these festivals across the Northwest and B.C.
text:
Plan ahead to attend these festivals across the Northwest and B.C. Originally published September 4, 2015 at 6:05 am Washington State Autumn Leaf Festival comes to Leavenworth on Sept. 25-27. (Mike Siegel/The Seattle Times) A regional roundup of celebrations in coming days and months. 
Methow Valley Rodeo, Sept. 5-6, Winthrop. 509-322-2651 or methowvalleyrodeo.com . 
Lopez Island Artists’ Studio Tour, Sept. 5-6, Lopez Island. lopezstudiotour.org . 
Chinook Arts Festival, Sept. 5-7, Chinook. 360-642-2400 or funbeach.com . Most Read Stories 
Paint the Peninsula Plein Air Painting Competition, Sept. 7-13, Port Angeles. paintthepeninsula.org . 
Wooden Boat Rendezvous, Sept. 7-9, Deer Harbor. woodenboatsocietyofthesanjuans.org . 
Port Townsend Wooden Boat Festival, Sept. 11-13, Port Townsend, nwmaritime.org/events/wooden-boat-festival/ 
Chuckanut Brewery & Kitchen Oktoberfest, Sept. 12, Bellingham. chuckanutbreweryandkitchen.com . 
Leavenworth Fall Wine Walk, Sept. 12, Leavenworth. cascadefarmlands.com . 
Whidbey Island Farm Tour, Sept. 12-13, Clinton. whidbeyfarmtour.com . 
Snohomish Pumpkin Hurl & Medieval Faire, Sept. 12-13, Everett. festivalofpumpkins.org . 
Wenatchee River Salmon Festival, Sept. 19, Wenatchee. salmonfest.org . 
Rainier Festival, Sept. 19-20, Ashford. rainierfestival.com . 
Washington State Autumn Leaf Festival, Sept. 25-27, Leavenworth. autumnleaffestival.com . 
Bellingham Bay Marathon, Sept. 27, Bellingham. bellinghambaymarathon.org . 
Old Apple Tree Festival, Oct. 3, Vancouver. visitvancouverusa.com . 
Car is King + Maryhill Arts Festival, Oct. 3-4, Maryhill. maryhillmuseum.org . 
Water Music Festival, Oct. 9-10, Long Beach Peninsula. 360-261-1598 or watermusicfestival.com 
Dungeness Crab & Seafood Festival, Oct. 9-11, Port Angeles. crabfestival.org . 
Orcas Island Film Festival, Oct. 9-12, Orcas Island. orcasfilmfest.com . 
Bite of the San Juan Islands, Oct. 25, Friday Harbor. visitsanjuans.com/events/bite-san-juan-islands . 
Friday Harbor Film Festival, Nov. 6-8, Friday Harbor. fhff.org . 
Wild & Scenic Film Festival: A Wild Life, Nov. 14, Orcas Island. orcascenter.org . 
Washington State Capitol Tours, daily, Olympia. 360-586-8687 or des.wa.gov . Oregon 
Harney County Fair, Sept. 2-6, Burns. 541-573-6166 or 541-573-2636. 
Oregon Covered Bridge Festival, Sept. 4-6, Cottage Grove. covered-bridges.org . 
Baker County Fair and Panhandle Rodeo, Sept. 4-7, 541-742-4222 or halfwayfairandrodeo.com . 
Sublimity Harvest Festival, Sept. 11-12, Sublimity. 503-769-3579 or sublimityharvestfest.com 
Gold Beach Brew and Art Festival, Sept. 12, Gold Beach. 541-490-1593 or goldbeachbrewfest.org . 
Mill-Luck Salmon Celebration, Sept. 12-13, North Bend. 800-953-4800 or themillcasino.com 
Shrewsbury Renaissance Faire, Sept. 12-13, Kings Valley. 541-929-4897 or shrewfaire.com . 
Mount Angel Oktoberfest, Sept. 17-20, Mount Angel. 855-899-6338 or oktoberfest.org 
Covered Bridge Festival, Sept. 18-20, Cottage Grove. 541-942-0046 or eugenecascadescoast.org . 
Rollin’ on the River, Sept. 19, Boardman. 541-481-3014 or boardmanchamber.org . 
Bay Area Fun Festival, Sept. 19-20, Coos Bay. 800-824-8486 or bayareafunfestival.com . 
Oregon’s Alpenfest, Sept. 24-27, Joseph. oregonalpenfest.blogspot.com . 
Corvallis Fall Festival, Sept. 26-27, Corvallis. 541-752-9655 or corvallisfallfestival.org . Idaho 
Spirit of Boise Balloon Classic, Sept. 2-6, Boise. spiritofboise.com . 
Idaho Shakespeare Festival: The Fantasticks, Sept. 4-27, Boise. idahoshakespeare.org . 
Fall Fest, Sept. 5-7, Sandpoint. 877-487-4643 or schweitzer.com . 
Lewiston Roundup Rodeo, Sept. 9-12, Lewiston. lewistonroundup.com . 
Indian Creek Festival, Sept. 11-12, Caldwell. cityofcaldwell.com . 
Harvest Festival, White Spring Ranch, Sept. 12, Genesee. whitespringranch.org . 
Orofino Lumberjack Days, Sept. 17-20, Orofino. orofinolumberjackdays.org . 
Sun Valley Harvest Festival, Sept. 18-20, Sun Valley. sunvalleyharvestfestival.com . 
Idaho Sawtooth Bluegrass Association Annual Fall Festival and Jam, Sept. 18-20, Weiser. idahosawtoothbluegrass.org . 
Coeur d’Alene Oktoberfest, Sept. 25-26, Coeur d’ Alene. coeurdaleneoktoberfest.com . 
RiverFest of the Lewis Clark Valley, Sept. 26, Clarkston. portofclarkston.com . 
Treasure Valley Celtic Festival and Highland Games, Sept. 26, Boise. idahoscotts.org . 
Head of the Pend Oreille Regatta, Sept. 26, Priest River. hopregatta.org . 
Thousand Springs Festival, Sept. 26-27, Hagerman. thousandspringsfestival.org . 
Old Boise Oktoberfest, Sept. 26, Boise. oldboise.com . 
Fallapalooza 2015, Oct. 3, Boise. fallapaloozaboise.com . 
Sun Valley Jazz Festival, Oct. 14-18, Sun Valley. sunvalleyjazz.com . 
McCall Winter Carnival, Jan. 27-Feb. 5, McCall. mccallchamber.org . British Columbia 
Vancouver Fringe Festival, Sept. 10-20, Vancouver. 604-257-0350 or vancouverfringe.com . 
Whistler Village Beer Festival, Sept. 16-20, Whistler. gibbonsevents.com/whistler-village-beer-festival . 
Whistler Longboard Festival, Sept. 18-20, Whistler. whistler.com . 
Cultural Heritage Festival, Sept. 19-Oct. 3, Tofino. pacificrimarts.ca . 
Mudderella Whistler, Sept. 26, Whistler. whistler.com . 
Horsefly Salmon Festival, Sept. 26-27, Horsefly. horseflyriver.ca/salmonfestival/index.html . 
Whistler Writers Festival, Oct. 15-18, Whistler. whistler.com . 
International Artist Day Festival, Oct. 23-25, White Rock. internationalartistday.com . 
Crush Grand Gala, Nov. 7, Whistler. whistlercornucopia.com . 
Cornucopia, Nov. 5-15, Whistler. whistlercornucopia.com . 
Poured: The Full Spectrum of Taste, Nov. 14, Whistler. whistlercornucopia.com . 
Whistler Film Festival, Dec. 2-6, Whistler. 800-944-7853 or whistlerfilmfestival.com . Tourist info
